deathPenaltyDetails: Ye lost a Level, yer Gold, an' a piece o' ee-quitment, but ye can get 'em all back wit' hard work! Good luck--ye'll do great.
dyingOftenTips: Do this be happenin' oft? 'ere be some tips!
losingHealthWarning2: Don't be lettin' yer Health drop t' naught! If ye do, ye'll lose a level, yer Gold, an' a piece o' equipment.
lowHealthTips2: Buy a Health Potion from th' Rewards column t' restore 15 Health Points.
lowHealthTips3: Incomplete Dailies hurt ye overnight, so be careful not t' add too many at first!
lowHealthTips4: If a Daily isn't due on a certain day, ye can disable it by clickin' th' pencil icon.
cannotRevive: Can't revive if yer not been sent to Davy Jones' locker
